mapper.insert: insert into milkyCart (cartCode, id, productCode, cartOption, cartQty) values ('cart00100'||milkyCartSeq.nextval , 'yun', #{productCode}, #{cartOption}, #{cartQty})
mapper.select: select productName, productUnit, id, cartOption, cartQty, productRate, cartCode from milkyCart join milkyproductinfo using(productcode) where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update milkyCart set cartQty=#{cartQty} where cartCode=#{cartCode}
